title: Deutsche Bank named Indonesia’s Best Corporate Bank by Asiamoney
body:
Deutsche Bank today announced it has been named Best Corporate Bank Indonesia at the 2022 Asiamoney Best Bank Awards, for its commitment and strong presence in Indonesia across foreign exchange and bond trading, investment banking, custody services, trade finance and cash management.
The Best Bank Awards identify banks that have excelled across a range of core banking activities in individual markets, with survey results drawn from detailed submissions from market participants and country visits conducted by senior editors from Asiamoney.
Samir Dhamankar, Head of Global Transaction Banking and Head of Securities Services for Deutsche Bank in Indonesia, said, “From being the number one FX house globally and in Asia Pacific, to the best domestic house across different asset classes, our awards testify to our deep local market expertise across fifteen markets in Asia Pacific."
Deutsche Bank Indonesia is a partner of choice for governments and corporates, and a gateway for foreign investors into Indonesia, with a unparalleled strength of products across corporate and investment banking.
Samir Dhamankar
The Corporate Bank serves as a hub for Deutsche Bank’s corporate and commercial clients. At its core is the Global Transaction Banking business, which is an established market leader in Europe with on the ground presence in more than 60 countries.
